description:
Designed and implemented process improvements through internal tooling, including scripting plans to automate employee schedule exports and reduce manual workload by 60%.
 Provided technical support and software solutions to streamline daily operations, applying systems thinking to identify future automation opportunities.

Provided one-on-one tutoring for students at George Mason University and Northern Virginia Community College across computer science, mathematics, and related technical subjects.
 Developed creative teaching methods to explain advanced concepts, tailoring lessons to individual learning styles.
 Helped students raise their grades by an average of 12% while also building long-term problem-solving skills and confidence.
